name: Glitter Cupcake Desserts
description:
Love cupcake? Why not eating normal cupcake while we have this trendy & sparkly glitter cupcake. So many glitter colors for you to put into your cupcake. When you take a bite, sweet & sparkly to surprise you.

- First, Let's prepare the vanilla cupcake.
- Add & mix all the ingredients together: Flour,butter,sugar,vanilla extract etc.
- Pour the cupcake batter to the cupcake liner. Put them into the oven.
- Tap the cupcake when they are done. Choose the glitter you like. Pour it to the cupcake.
- Choose your cupcake frosting cream, Pick as you like.
- Decorate your cupcake with so many sparkly sprinkles, sweet candy, fresh fruit and beautiful cupcake liners.
- Use your knife to cut the cupcake. You can see the glitter. Let’s take a bite.
- Take a photo to share with friends and invite them to make more glitter cupcakes.
